name: com.justzht.unilwp.droid.free
description: A free version of UniLWP.Droid. Works as a drop-in aar that converts your project into live walllpaper through one-click build. Notice this version is only a trial for full version and was shrinked down in terms of features, please check LICENSE for more info. For Java source, please check https://github.com/JustinFincher/UniLWP.Droid.Free.JavaSource
